description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Text_Block_CategoryObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Text_Block_CategoryObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Text_Block_CategoryObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: The reference to the text block category.

Text_Block_Category_Data.description: The ID for the text block category.
The name of the text block category.

validation.validation: Enter a unique Text Block Category Name. The name [name] is already in use.

description: Wrapper element for the details of a text block category.
